descriptions: Designed scalable microservices using .NET Core and deployed them on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), improving system resiliency for 2M+ monthly users
Led end-to-end cloud migrations, reducing deployment costs by 25% through Azure resource optimization
Enforced security protocols for high-concurrency APIs, achieving 99.9% uptime
Architected a health insurance microservices platform using Oracle OSB and .NET Core, boosting processing efficiency by 40%
Automated ETL workflows with Python, cutting data load times by 30%
Mentored 15+ developers in Agile practices, ensuring on-time delivery of 10+ mission-critical projects
Designed integrations for the health ecosystem consisting of 7 applications connected by services implemented in OSB Service Bus
Implemented 2 web applications based on APEX with ORACLE database, including customizations
Built cloud-first systems using Azure and WebSockets for real-time industrial data visualization
Developed a Xamarin-based mobile app with push notifications, replacing legacy systems and improving response times by 50%
Developed responsive web pages using CSS, XML, HTML, JavaScript, C# .NET API and SQL Server
Managed SQL Server and IIS server administration
Prioritized requirements and created roadmaps and schedules aligned with project scope
Performed planning using Gantt diagrams, MS Project, and WorkFront
Facilitated meetings with key leaders and collaborated with project teams to ensure timely decision-making and effective communication among stakeholders at all levels
Maintained detailed project records, including task progress, resource costs, and allocated budgets to analyze performance and handle management communication for critical decisions
Developed reports in SQL Server Reporting Services and performed basic server administration
Coordinated migration projects under SCRUM methodology, managing Control and Administration for the migration of Civil Liability, Auto, and Fire insurance policies
Participated as a developer during the migration of the accounting system to SAP, with all project developments done using SCRUM
Developed applications in Natural Software AG for business support and maintained the company's Core system
Developed integrations for sending information to SAP
Analyzed and developed applications in Visual Studio 2010 with SQL Server Database, ASP.NET and C#
Managed SQL Server administration, ICG Front Retail Administration, and reports
Supported and configured SAP Business ONE
Provided Oracle database support for Local Data Warehouse using information loading processes based on Linux BATCH Scripts
Analyzed, designed, and developed business reports with Oracle BusinessObjects and Oracle Database
Participated in the ERP migration project for travel agencies, migrating from VB6 to C# .NET with SQL Server 2005 database
